Trajectory#

class trajectory.Trajectory(path: str, verbose=False)#

Molecular dynamics trajectory.

Read and parse a MD trajectory file, generate an animated plot of the simulation and compute Mean Squared Displacement as well as the Radial Distribution Function.

Parameters:
pathstr

Path to the .xyz file containing the trajectory data.

verbosebool, default=False

Notes

Important

Most instance attributes are protected (names with a single leading underscore). Those should not be modified outside of class methods.

Methods#

trajectory.Trajectory.read_xyz(path)

Read the .xyz file at a given path.

trajectory.Trajectory.animate([wrap])

Animate the trajectories of the particles projected on the xy-plane.

trajectory.Trajectory.mean_squared_displacement([...])

Compute the Mean Squared Displacement of the trajectory over all possible time intervals, and plot the result.

trajectory.Trajectory.radial_distribution_function([...])

Compute the Radial Distribution Function of the trajectory, and plot the result.
